text:
❗🏥 Seek immediate medical care.

❗Call ahead to the clinic or emergency room if you can. Tell them that you have COVID-19. 

❗ If you call 911 🚑 , tell the operator that you have COVID-19. This helps health care staff prepare for your arrival.

🚫 🚌  Avoid using public transportation, taxis, or rideshares (Lyft, Uber) if you can, so you don’t expose other people. If you must use public transit, see www.sfcdcp.org/safertransit
